name: deimosrising
text: You actually can say that in Heaven, but everyone will look really disappointed in you.

name: centipede_damascus
text: A comment left by centipede_damascus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ishuta, TwoRightFeet, JuanCarlos)

name: bron
text: Teodor's available for birthday parties and drag races.

name: belgand
text: I would be remiss in failing to mention that your mother can also be chartered for both such occasions in a lascivious capacity.

name: greenkoolayd
text: i laughed so hard that i choked!  i was seeing stars for a minute!

name: greenkoolayd
text: i admit that i was being overly dramatic, but i did laugh so hard that i started coughing.

name: cashprizes
text: T is doing the drag race equivalent of singing the national anthem.

name: prolefeed5
text: With the cocked eyebrow and pantaloons he looks like he's reciting Shakespeare...

name: zapatos
text: He very well could be, it can't be said in heaven and God hates those 'gay'

name: mercuri0us
text: Shakespeare was pretty dirty.

name: ambala
text: There are rules in heaven after all.

name: saint
text: "Teodor, it's God. Think you could come talk dirty for my son's birthday?"

name: blarghamagarky
text: coincidentally I am reading your comment and that day is today

name: tasteful
text: Are You There, Teodor? It's Me, God

name: saint
text: "is it...is it JESUS?!

name: someone3
text: i despreatly want to know what he said... please?

name: synnah
text: No, I'm not going to tell you!

name: f1shst1ck
text: I like that Onstad always had little nephew with his backpack

name: antsama
text:
Oh come on I wanna know what you can't say in Heaven!

Also F-F-F-F-F-F-F-F-FIRST APPEARANCE OF THE THONG.

name: spectre
text: referred to as "briefs", mysteriously

name: godfatherofsouls
text: i noticed the strap looked a little thick before reading the text. at this point he seems to have just gotten into the habit of crotchgarments-- I wager he went with briefs the first day, then invested in some garments more suited to his tastes after deciding underwear was For Him.

name: brokeaccount
text: Someone just got neu-tered...

name: zefiel
text: It's always unnerved me how in the last panel Téodor has seemingly lost half of his right leg. It also looks like that in the book, so I wonder if it was intentional and what it might entail.

name: _cheesekayke
text: I believe it was perspective. Teodor is striking hell of stances as he delivers the show.

name: djwhiterabbit
text:
in a perhaps-futile attempt to decipher the dirtiness, i've tried to find words that fit the space and shape in a similar font (though so far i can't pinpoint the exact font used).

click here to see what i've come up with so far.

there are definitely two 'fucking's in there and at least one 'shit' - the 'mother' is a fairly confident guess.

i'd be much-obliged to anyone who can put forth some additional suggestions (or anyone who can positively ID the font)!

name: evolume
text: A chubby to you for your effort sir.

name: zefiel
text: Blue Highway.

name: norrin
text: Will someone post what it says on the link? I can't open it.

name: carpetbag
text: The preview on Amazon.com for Achewood Volume 2 reveals the censored phrases in this strip and The Dirtiest Dudes in Town; I refrain from quoting them here should there be those who wish to preserve the mystery.

name: jujubeesforjesus
text: Mark it.  It takes exactly 3 appearances for Ray to get his thong on.

name: gouldgonewild
text: I like how one of Nephew's friends laughs. "Hah ha! Ha ha ha Haahaa!"

name: snowman
text: what is in your avatar?

name: rowboat
text:
I can't tell if you're asking jujubeesforjesus or gouldgonewild, but if it is the latter (just in case he never comes back here and this mystery is keeping you up at night), it looks a hell of a lot like this to me:

[IMGS OFF]

I've never really settled on whether they are (were?) a decently interesting band or a terribly annoying one. Somehow, it's right in-between.

name: snowman
text:
I have friends that have been into them for a long time, but they've never grabbed my attention somehow.

But yeah, that cartoon looked so familiar (yet pixelated), and I couldn't figure out where I knew it from, so, thanks.

name: gouldgonewild
text: I think it's about time I changed my avatar.  This discussion scares me.

name: rowboat
text: If this conversation scares you more than Daft Punk, you and I fear different things.

name: snowman
text: In fact, if this conversation scares you at all ...I'm baffled.

name: gouldgonewild
text: It scares me that no one else seems to like Soul Coughing. You want to hear something truly frightening, though? Listen to M. Doughty's new single, "27 Jennifers".  I don't know what happened.

name: redjoker
text: notice how one of nephews friends is pleasuring himself...

name: lawdog
text: A comment left by lawdog was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by blastradius, rhymesforkids, Droplede, aHatOfPig, peterjoel, morbo)

name: starbucks
text: A comment left by starbucks was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by blastradius, rhymesforkids, peterjoel, opalleye, morbo)

name: lux
text: Maybe because you read the comic?

name: honesttom
text: Could this also be the first appearance of Downtown Dave?

name: quarantine
text: Yesss Little Nephew

name: drskradley
text: Ray is wearing semi-clothing, finally.  Beef still does not (sans tie).

name: shogun
text:
At the drive-in
In the old man's Ford.

name: squi
text:
I am trying to figure out why one of Little Nephew's party guests is wearing a collar and a dunce cap. I though maybe he's a clown, but looks the same hieght as all of the kid cats.
Either he's got a friend with an odd sense of fashion, or they hired little-person midget.

name: pr0ncess
text: I'm guessing it's a party hat, not a dunce cap. Dunno about the collar...

name: jlynes
text: His mom made him wear a tie, because everyone should dress up for a party.

name: jeet
text:
I guess younger cats mostly stick to their breed socially? There are only two non-American Curls at LN's party.

Or maybe it is just the style to have round ears and all the youth are getting their ears cut that way. They'll be sorry for it when they are older.

name: heccibiggs
text:
Oh my God, I never knew what breed Ray was before (possibly missed it in my first readthrough of the archive?) and always wondered why his ears were round, I thought it made him look more like a teddy bear than a cat.

And now everything makes SO MUCH MORE SENSE. Thank you. I mean, superimpose some glasses and this genuinely could be Ray .

name: buttermoths
text: Dang, Ray is a lot of things, but I've never thought of him as 'cute'. But gosh-darn me if that ain't adorable.

name: brynito
text: I wish this was a real, paying job. Not that I would be successful, I just think it'd be a sign the world is not as suckass as the tv tells me it is via sitcoms.

name: hamscout
text:
It made this guy a lot of money (for a while)...
[IMGS OFF]

name: farqussus
text: which he blew on Bedazzlers.

name: zapatos
text: At first I thought, "ADC looks badass!" then I realized he only looks fat.

name: seph
text: I think Todd ended up carrying the torch that Téodor started here.

name: rascaldom
text: Perhaps this is how Little Nephew came to be the way he is? Did Teodor plant the seeds of rebellion in him? At Ray's request?

name: tekende
text: I like how in the first panel it kind of looks like Ray and Teodor are going opposite directions on an escalator.

name: dybrar
text: I enjoy this idea.

name: nabeel84
text: Teodor is enormous compared to the cats in the early strips.

name: 21echoes
text: "Shit mothers in extreme fucking!"
